title: Hastings Victoria Escape with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Bottle of Wine
description:
Experience the charm and relaxing vibe of the Mornington Peninsula with a stay at this newly renovated address in Hastings. Breathe in the fresh ocean air at this rejuvenating escape just a stone's throw from the region's renowned wineries, artisanal eateries and the picturesque Westernport Bay. With dreamy coastal walks and beaches at your fingertips, you can unwind at one with nature.

Rest in tastefully redecorated rooms and make a splash in the pool or laze on the patio. Enjoy delicious Italian cuisine at Toscano Italian Kitchen & Wine Bar, or enjoy a leisurely stroll around the peaceful green surrounds. For the explorers, the breathtaking Cape Schanck and its historic lighthouse are a short drive away,
